website_summaries.verdict: The go-to pad for Western riders.
pros: The contoured felt pad has a reinforced leather spine and wither relief notch for comfort
Lightweight, it keeps horses cooler than thicker pads
Wicks off sweat and stays in place
cons: The 1" thick wool felt was not thick enough for some
Along with the leather, it’s hard to clean

customer_reviews.title: Diamond Wool is a Cowboy's  "BEST KEPT SECRET"
customer_reviews.text: You can always count on Diamond Wool to produce a quality product for a great price. I don't recall how long we have relied on DIamond Wool pads for EVERY DAY, 8-10 hours a day!! Maybe 20 years or more. Started using them when a cutting trainer (million dollar NCHA rider) suggested them. EXCELLENT!!! Just ordered three more!!
customer_reviews.author: Murtry

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pad to use with my Tucker high plains saddle, square skirt. Once unboxing...I could Not get over how soft the felt was...it was so comfy. It molds to your horse for a secure fit! Molds to your saddle also! This is a nice thick pad, very good quality, price is very reasonable, the color is perfect, and it will last for years! I can compare this pad to a 5 star pad but a lot cheaper in price!!! WOW is all I can say! Highly recommend this investment! You want go wrong with this pad!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pad! Very thick high quality felt, doesn't slide around.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Super durable pad for heavy riding.
customer_reviews.text: Great pad! Super durable. I ride in it 6 days a week for 4-8 hours and never had and saddle sore, etc. Will sometimes squish out going up and down steep grades but that's mostly my saddles fault. Will definitely buy more again in the future for the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: The best saddle pad!
customer_reviews.text: One of our absolute favorite pads! Light weight, easy to saddle. Keeps horses cooler, reduces sweat, and keeps tack in place. This is the only saddle pad we will buy!
customer_reviews.author: Farm Wife & Momma

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Works great! It’s my new go to pad when I ride which is daily and sometimes multiple times a day. It holds a smell of course but it’s hard to get away from that unless you’re gonna use neoprene and even then...
customer_reviews.author: C. Bry

customer_reviews.title: Good quality working pads. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I love these pads. They are good quality without costing an arm, leg, and your firstborn child like some other brands. I use them for ranch work, including roping and riding rough terrain and they last a long time in heavy work. Also, super fast shipping. Got an estimated arrival date of the 21st through the 26th... It arrived on the 20th.
customer_reviews.author: Jen R.

customer_reviews.title: But I like that I was able to get a pad that ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been using long on my horse (a warmblood). But I like that I was able to get a pad that was 32" long and that it is 1" thick. I don't need to use a second pad (she has high withers). The saddle I use picks up the color of the pad and on my fleabitten grey it looks good with her black and brown speckles.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Drommond Keegan

customer_reviews.title: Best saddle pad I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: It absorbs sweat like no other I've seen, it fits perfect on my mare's back, it is comfortable and well manufactured, the best quality saddle pad I've ever purchased, I highly recommend the Diamond Wool contour felt Ranch saddle pad.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pad!
customer_reviews.text: This is way worth the money. Nice and full. Used it on a long trail ride and my horse didn’t have a lot of sweat u dear it. Also didn’t slip as my other pads. Which is way I got it I the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy W.

customer_reviews.title: Great pad - bad shipping procedures
customer_reviews.text: The pad itself is great - nice dense wool. However I was really disappointed to see that it was folded into a square and taped down to fit into a box that was too small. A wool pad with a leather spine should not be folded up like a blanket. It has permanent fold lines in the leather and wool now, and it is brand new. Such a shame. I do wonder if NRS world is aware they are shipping pads like this?
customer_reviews.author: dave d.

customer_reviews.title: Great saddle pad
customer_reviews.text: Have had these before and absolutely love the design and comfort for my horse. Definitely well made. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: A pleasant surprise. Well made. 32x32 nice size open over withers. Would like natural light color for summer. I recommend it. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, dries well
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this pad. I've used it for probably 15 rides so far. It doesn't rub and dries really nicely despite the humid and hot Indiana summer and being stored in an isolated tack room. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this saddle pad. It fits my horse well and he seems to like it more than my old pad. Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for fit and value
customer_reviews.text: I have found Diamond Wool saddle pads to be the best in value and quality for a reasonable price. This particular pad fits my mare and I know from previous experience that it will hold up well under our busy rodeo schedule.
customer_reviews.author: cat hammers

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality blanket. Nice and thick, and well constructed. Good looking too.
customer_reviews.author: toddmtb

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a haflinger crossed with a TW, he's a gaited, mutton withered, with a short broad back. This pad fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Candelilla

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great saddle pad for what I paid. Only bad thing is when your horse gets ridden hard, sometimes the pad holds a horsey smell and needs to be put in the sun to dry out. Would definately buy again.
customer_reviews.author: spm

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This pad has been great for my Tennessee Walking Horse! She and I have been able to log many miles without the saddle slipping or her getting sore!
customer_reviews.author: InvisibleJenn

customer_reviews.title: Great pad
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased a different brand of pad before this one. That pad kept sliding out the back of our saddle. We came home and ordered this pad. We have ridden in this pad 3 times so far and no slippage! We love it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Neumiller

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was great came in great condition
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was great came in great condition, not bent or folded. The contouring is very nice, the cut out for the evening withers is spot on. Makes for a great for on the horse and under the saddle...
customer_reviews.author: KatK9

customer_reviews.title: Fit for the horse' back
customer_reviews.text: Well, I liked the pad because it fit my horses back. I also liked it because this was the first time he didn't try to buck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Saddle Pad
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this saddle pad, I've had it for more than 6 months now and it has held up beautifully. I do a lot of long trail rides through the mountains and it keeps my sweet guy nice and comfortable. I'm ordering a second one for my spare saddle!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but the best
customer_reviews.text: Only the best for my four legged baby. Great value and well worth the money. Comfortable fit for girl.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great pad
customer_reviews.text: Cant go wrong with this pad for the money! Very well made and durable. Takes a little while to break in but once it does its wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Tavares

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pad. Has held up well. Good price when compared to other brands/pads.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Great pad
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried other pads but always end up coming back to the diamond wool pads
customer_reviews.author: Scott W.

customer_reviews.title: Not as thick as expected
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a nice felt pad but is not an 1" thick. And seems to thin out with use. Only have been using for 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan J.

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: This saddle pad is perfectly contoured and has great grip. No saddle slippage. AND it keeps my horse cool.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W

customer_reviews.title: Love this pad so far
customer_reviews.text: Love this pad so far. Just used it this past weekend when I showed over all very nice pad and works wonderful on my horse
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A Hinrichs

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I will always buy this pad. It conforms well to each horse and it’s nice and thick. They last a long time so it’s great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Good All-around Pad
customer_reviews.text: Good, comfortable all-around pad. I will buy another one for my new horse when I can.
customer_reviews.author: Tim and Lori

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my dtr and she loved it. Fits great
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: great pad, good price!
customer_reviews.text: pPad was exactly as described. Nice and thick. Works well, very comfortable for my horse.
customer_reviews.author: AJM

customer_reviews.title: Really nice saddle pad
customer_reviews.text: Really nice saddle pad. You can spend a lot more for the similar item at local feed store. It's worked well and doesn't slip like fleece. Plus it looks good too!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea D.

customer_reviews.title: Good saddle pad for roping
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this pad, fits well on my horse with no need for extra padding. I like it and will be getting another when it's time for another new one.
customer_reviews.author: wesley

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Husband was super pleased with the quality and I was pleased with the price.
customer_reviews.author: A CO customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money 🙂 Good quality. Fits my high withered TB perfect 👌 Definitely recommend it for arena work/ trail rides
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pad
customer_reviews.text: This pad is exactly what I expected and lives up to its name! Diamond Wool Pads are excellent and are the main pad I use with my horses!
customer_reviews.author: RBD

customer_reviews.title: handsome and comfortable for my horses
customer_reviews.text: This thing is tough, handsome and comfortable for my horses.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality pad
customer_reviews.text: This pad made a big difference, fits perfect definitely a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: I really like this pad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pad for the price. I have used it for a few months now and it holds up well, I ended up buying a second one too!
customer_reviews.author: kenzie

customer_reviews.title: Very well structured wicks away moisture very well for cutting ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well structured wicks away moisture very well for cutting and trail ridding does not move once saddle is tighten
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of my showman pad and wanted to try something different. First use, my saddle fit better and overall it made tacking up easier.
customer_reviews.author: E.L.

customer_reviews.title: Thick!! Affordable!!
customer_reviews.text: Real nice thick pad,looks great and solid!! Also arrived fast,thanks folks
customer_reviews.author: Miles Currier

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it... Great quality and awesome feel. Don't be hooked by cheap imitation. He will love this pad.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pad for the Money
customer_reviews.text: As described. Works well. We use it and it seems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality pad.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for the horse. Good quality. Nice size for trail riding and having bags added to saddle.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Raap

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pad!
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine in the mail and its great. Exactly like the picture and a really good price. I defiantly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: annieeeeeee

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this pad to anyone that rides more than 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pad for just over a year and the wool is separating from the rubber grip. I would not recommend this pad to anyone that rides more than 5 times a year.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, nice weight and quality, fits well and their backs really do stay cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pad! Fits both my Reining saddle and my Roping Saddles perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Candice Baral

customer_reviews.title: Low density wool construction.
customer_reviews.text: Not enough density for my liking. Ordered a 3/4" but when pressed between fingers maybe actually a 1/2" pad. Because of this the saddle stays loose, have to tighten cinch to extreme. Will be a good thin pad when ridden in. But there are better pads out there for a little more money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: only proble with it being felt every thing sticks to it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mary gaff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product, great value. Love it. So does me pony!
customer_reviews.author: john buhrman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for my horse and me
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional pad. Comfortable for my horse and me. Fits my Vinton saddle really well.
customer_reviews.author: S Fieck

customer_reviews.title: Super thin and useless as a saddle pad
customer_reviews.text: Super thin and felt cheaply made. We returned this item due to the poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karen T.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that it's really really stiff and I can't get my saddle as tight as it needs to be
customer_reviews.author: Honorth

product_meta.title: Diamond Wool Contour Felt Ranch Pad
product_meta.description: Diamond Wool Contour Felt Ranch Pad The Diamond Wool Contour Ranch Pad is made with Ranch Tough 1" thick wool felt. The contoured spine has a wither relief notch and is reinforced with distressed leather. Take a ride in one today and feel the difference!
